channel.title: Char command
channel.description: I recently fixed my ::char command so I can change my looks of my character and what not but whenever I log out and back in, im back to default look. Anyone know any way to make it save, I also want to make my ::magics2 command save if it's used. NOTE: I used testscape source.

item.title: Char command
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

:eek: Ok ill give it a go…[br][size=1]Posted at: September 22, 2006, 09:58:27 PM[/size][hr]Ahh im lost, it would be nice if someone posted the code of the booleans and voids I need to declare, because im totally lost here

Read full topic

item.title: Char command
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Here is a hint: Use booleans. for the magic one

for the character appearance, you must look for the saving void, and make it save the appearance:)

Read full topic
